name: Draconis Desertum
description:
Draconis Desertum

A lightly-interactive story about looking for something that may or may not be out in the desert.

Move with arrow keys or wasd. Bump into things to interact :)

Created for the 🌵 cactus (bitsy jam) 🌵

===================================================

CREDITS:

  • Made in Adam Le Doux's Bitsy 
  • Music added using Add Music by Candle 
  • Music is "The Crisper" by Blue Dot Sessions
